scripts.build: echo 'Build skipped for Docker - run npm run build-real for actual build'
scripts.docker:start-service: sudo systemctl start docker && sudo systemctl enable docker
scripts.docker:full-setup: npm run docker:setup && npm run docker:start-service && npm run docker:fix-permissions
scripts.docker:generate-key: docker-compose exec app php artisan key:generate
scripts.docker:migrate: docker-compose exec app php artisan migrate
scripts.docker:seed: docker-compose exec app php artisan db:seed
scripts.docker:check-env: docker-compose exec app cat .env | grep DB_
scripts.docker:fix-all: npm run docker:fix-composer && npm run docker:generate-key && npm run docker:fix-permissions
scripts.docker:create-env: docker-compose exec app cp .env.example .env || echo 'No .env.example found'
scripts.docker:init-laravel: npm run docker:create-env && npm run docker:fix-composer && npm run docker:generate-key && npm run docker:migrate
scripts.docker:quick-fix: npm run docker:stop-queue && npm run docker:fix-composer && npm run docker:generate-key && npm run docker:start-queue
scripts.docker:health-check: docker-compose exec app php -v && docker-compose exec app composer --version && docker-compose exec db mysql --version
